subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] What is this thing for, and how does it work?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
It would ordinarily be used to align and check out audio amplifiers,
e.g. stereo amps, musical instrument amps, etc. as well as test and
align various pieces of audio equipment, filters, etc.

Back in the old days they were units with a big knob on the front to
adjust the output frequency.

Zack


On 10/29/10, SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@...> wrote:
